lines.text: There's no assurance for me and my kind, Superintendent. I've been black for 38 years, I know. She may have looked white, but Sapphire was colored.
Your sister was murdered. We'll find out who killed her.
I'm sure that is your intention.
It is my intention. It's also my job.
These spades are a load of trouble. I reckon we should send them back where they came from. We wouldn't have half this bother if they weren't here.

Well, I suppose you're right. Just the same as we wouldn't have old ladies being clobblered by hooligans if there weren't any old ladies. So what do you do? Get rid of the hooligans or the people they bash?
Look Phil, given the right atmosphere you can organize riots against anyone - Jews, Catholics, Negroes, Irish - even policemen with big feet.
We didn't solve anything, Phil. We just picked up the pieces.
Oh David, whatever made you get mixed up with a colored girl?
Last week. By then I didn't care.
